reviews.review_msg: are you guys serious??? his tests were soo hard. his lectures are really easy to follow and clear but the tests are nothing like the lectures.

his tests don't measure what you actually know. i always heard him talk about the students that didn't do well. and i guess he could be helpful, but there is no point because his tests are unreasonable.  don't take this class if you dont' have to. it's only going to bring your gpa down.
